The use topical medicine , provide evidence chronic dosing risk systemic exposure , occasional acetaminophen acceptable Have donate blood 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last 3 month Are unwilling comply dietary requirements/restrictions study : Consume meal provide inpatient appointment , Refrain eat food drinking beverage contain grapefruit , grapefruit juice , Seville oranges , Seville orange juice , star fruit , pomelo , commercial apple juice orange juice least 7 day prior first dose
